message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $10800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $9800. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $10200, but that's as low as I can go.
